key_risks: Revenue growth challenges with a 1.25% decline in FY 2023-24 and projected -1.0% decline in Q2 FY24
High employee attrition rates at 17.3%, leading to increased hiring and training costs
Pricing pressure and margin erosion due to intense competition in the IT services sector
Regulatory and cybersecurity risks, including data privacy and compliance issues
Leadership and strategic uncertainty with the appointment of a new CEO in 2023
controversies: Scrutiny over workplace culture and high employee attrition rates
Regulatory scrutiny related to data privacy and cybersecurity compliance
environmental_issues: Commitment to achieving net-zero emissions by 2040, but no significant environmental controversies reported
social_issues: High employee attrition rates and associated costs
Workplace culture concerns and labor practices
governance_issues: Strategic uncertainty due to leadership transition with the appointment of a new CEO
